description: Great concept and app to have in linux for personal or work reasons. i've helped my gf study for exams by making mindmaps of chapters and concepts and it proved extremely useful. Awesome way to retain and display a lot of information without the typical, boring writing/typing format that makes info hard to stick for me.
summary: Pretty cool but not intuitive so much

description: I love alll the UX thanks this is awesome
Terrific program, very helpful

Very slick mind mapping software with similar controls and functionality to xmind zen. Layout options are good and has a good balance of forcing good layout / letting you move items. Images easy to add / resize, although SVG images appear blurry. The focus button dimming branches you aren't working on is a great idea. Making branches tasks and seeing the percentage completed is clever too.
Does what it need to do, does it well and does not get in the way.
That's great. Very clean and friendly interface. Promising.
It's very simple but very fast for taking simple mind map notes. Not very useful for creating more complex mind map documents.

I like it more than the to do list widgets. It is easy to establish connections between small items that you wouldn't want to keep in storage for long. 

It also helps in creating a small individual trees for more complex tasks. 

I know that it is actively maintained. would love to see flourish more.

This application is very simple as it Lack the Deep comlexity but thats the best thing about this App, minimalistic Approach yet powerfull.

This is what i am looking For. Awesome App!
summary: It's Great and Comfortable App, to BrainStorm stuff

description:
Everything is easy to find in the gui and there are keyboard shortcuts for everything. My only complaint is that there is no way to easily pan around that I've found.

Thank you so much for making this!
summary: Beautiful, efficient, just what I was looking for

description:
On both my x arch install and wayland ubuntu, the flatpak version hard crashes when I resize the window.
Very good program though
summary: Great app but major bug on flatpak

description: I have already installed and removed many mind-mapping applications for Linux. I will definitely keep this one. Thank you very much!
Easy to use, but wouldn't save to file (Flatpak v1.11.1  stable x86_64).
summary: Doesn't save to file, so can't recommend

description: I use it for my study and organize thoughts. Excellent tool.

As a open source graphics expert....the simplicity and ease of use of minder baffled me! Took me minutes to learn using the cheat sheet. 
Highly recommended for Everything.
NO-NONSENSE piece of software....should be included(natively) by default in the gnome stack.

There are some shortcomings. You cannot select multiple nodes to copy and rearrange them which makes it difficult to do batch tasks.
It should be possible to select multiple nodes.
This software is great. I used to use xmind on pc but on moving to linux I decided to search for open source tools first. This compete favourably with xmind. In some ways it might be better.

Smooth, quick, and easy. A great mind mapper without the clutter and confusion of other, similar, tools. May not have the bells and whistles that Freeplane has, but well worth putting it in your toolbox. It could use some added features: being able to move the map around without grabbing a central node or having to zoom, changing color and format of text, having the ability to collapse individual nodes without resorting to a menu, etc. Can't wait to see as it matures, though. I expect this will be a 5 star application.

This is the most intuitive mind mapper I have come across. I mostly use mind maps as an aide to thinking and ocasianlly for sharing. This just feels natural and makes good looking maps. When I am not using paper and pens this is the best alternative.
summary: Great for thinking. App just gets out the way and lets you flow

description: The mindmap look nice, but the interface does not invite to any more complicated work. You can't freely select nodes or move nodes with the mouse, and that make a mindmap with many nodes quickly grow outside the window borders, as all sub trees grow either straight horizontally ort vertically . The only way to view the full mindmap is to zoom faaar making it tiny. If the developer work on these parts, this could be a great app.
I like this kind of app. It is amazing I recommend it

Boom, all of the lines connecting your nodes vanished. Some of the text is now invisible. Luckily, you just saved, so just close and re-open the project. Phew. But no, closing the program, and re-opening it and the project still have the map all over the place, with lines gone and text invisible until selected.

Navigating and zooming could also use a bit of polish, as mentioned in other reviews.
Worked great for me, until I wanted to re-open the .minder I saved.
summary: If crashing is what you want, install it!

description: This is everything I've been looking for. However, I often can't reopen the mindmaps I was relying on. It's great when it works but it's to crashy for anyone to trust it with anything important to them. Hope this gets better in the future.
Would be happy if there was two way linking through arrows and many to many links
hope fix bug ASAP
summary: good before, but it's crash after upgrade

description: Haven't had any issues with the app yet (been using for a few months). Love the simple interface. Does everything I need to do.
The first mind mapping software that I've actually found useful.

Due to a power outage my computer shutdown. Not it won't open anymore. I uninstalled and re-installed.

When it was working it worked great.
summary: Doesn't open anymore after improper shutdown

description: Try to only use programs on my setup that use my system theme, this doesn't. If you dont care about that then it's probably a good tool.
summary: Looks useful, doesn't match system theme

description: You will never return to slow and buggy programs written in Java like XMind. Minder is fast, handy and beautiful. It will change your life!
summary: Excellent! Can't imagine my life without Minder

description: I wrote the first draft of a gaming module in Minder and exported it in outline mode. This app has literally helped me make money. It's exactly what I need .
Has most features I need. Simple and clean interface. Nice map result. I think I will not looking for other apps to do mind mapping.

Does exacty what it is supposed to do! 

The UI is stylish and clear and easily customized at least as much as I ever needed. The application has an excellent export function to export the mindmap to amarkdown file. This really saves me a lot of work. 

I use Minder to plan my articles and books that I write. It is easy to create the outline in Minder and then export it to markdown to continue writing. For markdown I use Typora and these apps work together very well.
Just created a first simple mind map. Works easy and fast. Simple solution with a lot of possible options.
Just an awesome simple app
Really helpful. Thanks
After searchinng a lot a app like this, i finally find what i was looking for. Thanks!

Sleek and easy to use. The simple keyboard shortcuts are efficient and easy to learn. The only thing that stops my productivity with this is the fact that there seems to be no easy way to move the screen's viewfield. I can scroll up and down but can't move horizontally. I can only zoom out or jump from one node to the next. I wish there was a way to just click the screen and drag it over so I could see the things I want at once.
The best mindmap application I ever used in Linux. The reference of UI/UX work. 5 stars.
Fullly recomended App ! Thanks
This is the reason I use linux.

Eventhough is not very intuitive, it counts with lots of usable features to help you organize ideas, concepts, or content.
100 recommended.
The application does not work in Fedora Wayland. The interface does not load and the application is useless in Fedora
summary: Does not work in fedora Wayland

description: Great and its free.
summary: Better than most paid apps like this

description: Many thanks for such beautiful application ! Love you
summary: Exactly what i was looking for

description:
The power of this particular mind mapping software lies in not complicating the free flow of ideas generation and capture - like
other over elaborate mind mapping softwares do - but allow you to quickly frame your ideas trough simple menueing and efficient placement of the necessary features of such a program.

It's bad enough that the nature of PC mind mapping removes elements such as kinesthetic input, but to add to the complication by keeping you busy with properties boxes and settings is not conducive to the central idea of this concept.

This particular mind mapping application hits a comfortable balance within its various elements and resources thus allowing you to actually mind map. Nice going.
summary: A mind mapping application you can actually put to use

description: Terrific program! Extremely beneficial for my business model among a plethora of other projects.
I'm using it for studying and it is easy and functional. I love it.

While the version several years ago worked fine, this one is full of bugs.

I can't roll up or down because the function freezes after a couple of new branches.

I can't save it because it saves only a portion of the map.

In its present state it's a useless app.
summary: Errors to save a map and view it

description: It takes to long to figure out what functions are and where they are. A few rare functions just might not work.
Great Tool! Outperformes some commercial solutions
summary: Great Tool! Outperformes some commercial solutions

description: Einfach zu bedienen, ansprechende und übersichtliche Darstellung. Viele Exportmöglichkeiten. Wirklich gelungen.
Das Programm wäre toll, wenn es außer englisch auch in deutsche Srache geben würde.
Mindmapping Tool ohne viel Ballast. Übersichtlich.
App is crushing, not easy to use
No se ve alguna ayuda o tutorial disponible, ....por dios...
La principal ventaja es que no te insiste en comprar otra versión, como Xmind. Funciona bastante bien. Se puede exportar a muchos formatos.
Muy buena app, super sencilla, no necesita manual para poder usarla, lo mejor, no inciste en comprarla.
Minder es una de las mejores opciones gratuitas después de Xmind Zen. Fluida, elegante, moderna.
Excelente aplicacción, pero desde que actualice a Fedora 34 y minder dejo de funcionar.

La aplicación es muy buena y aunque pueda parecer poco intuitiva es fácil acostumbrarse si vemos los atajos de teclado, pero lo malo viene cuando quieres usarla en otro escritorio que no sea gnome ya que en otros escritorios que usan xorg no funciona nada bien, además de que incluso en gnome se cierra o se traba de la nada
summary: Muy buena pero debería funcionar en otros escritorios

description:
En Debian 11 no se ve bien la interfaz. Desaparecen los botones, no se carga bien la interfaz; se ve literalmente rota la interfaz (faltan pedazos).
Mejorando eso es excelente la idea de la aplicación y los acabados de los diagramas.
Una aplicación muy necesaria para mapas mentales, muy didáctica, es fácil de manejar, bueno al principio no es muy intuitiva, pero después de darle una mirada a sus características, es sencillo.
It is good, but crashes, and I just lost the track of the position of the nodes, cant regroup them
summary: It is good, but can be better

description: la meilleure appli de carte mentale qui existe je pense, deux trois plantages de temps en temps mais jamais le travail n'a été perdu
Une belle interface, bien conçue !
Demande une petite prise en main. Permet d'exporter en pdf, bmp, etc. Tout ce que je voulais et gratuitement !

Très efficace une fois pris en main.
La création de noeuds enfants ou frère se fait très simplement.
Export dans différents formats très complet.
L'application est très sympa mais les sauvegardes n'ont pas l'air de fonctionner.
Interface claire e t fonctionnelle, permet de développer des cartes complexes tout en y associant du contenu
summary: Super application qui répond bien à mes attentes

description: Parfait, bien mieux que les équivalents non-libres.

Application simple, rapide, efficace, pour créer des "pieuvres" tentaculaires. Plus simple et rapide que Xmind pour un résultat très élégant. L'application est très professionnelle.
KDE, aucun problème de thèmes.
Je l'utilise a toutes les sauces !
summary: Très utile et simple. je recommande

description:
Я понимаю, что есть весьма громоздкие решения типа XMind. Думал использовать как раз его, но нашёл куда более понятное и симпатичное приложение.

Этот вариант понравился своим минимализмом, useability и при этом выглядит красиво, что не может не подкупать.

Есть, что развивать и улучшать, и различные хотелки принимаются во внимание на странице проекта на github.
Видимо пытались сделать минимализм, но получилось непонятно и довольно убого, по сравнению с другими аналогами, ничего не понятно. Пытался пол часа честно разобратся. Удалил нахрен в итоге.

Не хватает только пары функций (сводка и рамка) и версии под окана что бы коммерческий конкурент побледнел) Ну и кнопки fold прямо на теме.
Эта версия лучше чем версия под флатпак.

Возможно, для некоторых, будет не удобно из-за англоязычного интерфейса, но если вы владеете английским языком, то разобраться в приложении - вопрос 10 минут, останется только привыкнуть. Если часто работаете над архитектурой, приложений или баз данных, - это приложение из раздела "must have", особенно учитывая что кожно развёрнуто и удобно комментировать узлы, это вам не километровые списки стряпать... И само приложение выглядит очень симпатично.
Огромное спасибо!
самое тупое что я видел

1) Возможен частый баг, когда файлы этого формата заблокируются навсегда для всех устройств (основная причина, ПОЧЕМУ Я БРОСИЛ МАЙНДЕР). И все ваши наработки навсегда потеряются. Уважайте своё время, работайте лучше в ИксМайнд.
2) Нельзя возвращаться обратно (Ctrl+Z), если удалил текст, картинку,нельзя вернуть и стиль удалённых веток. Удалил случайно - будь добр заново всё восстанавливай по памяти.
3) Постоянный баг с панелью редактировани - она периодически заслоняет весь экран, и её размер нельзя уменьшить, только скрыть табло целиком.
4) При построении более менее больших схем баг с расположением ветвей - вся инт.карта сползается в один комок, из которого тебе необходимо доставать и сортировать в нужном порядке все ветви!
summary: Работал во всех (!) программах данного жанра - эта самая худшая

description: Мне понравилось, довольно интуитивно и понятно. Искал что-то похожее на xmind, в плане удобства работы.
Всем Советую, довольно круто, просто и бесплатно
Весьма редкостное дерьмо!

Замечательная программа под миндмап. Чтобы начать, нужно пробежаться по хоткеям. Чтобы разобраться, есть настройки. 
Спасибо!
我无法输入中文，按照上面网友说的做，也还是不行。

1、点击右上角“Show Property Sidebar"，再点击“Stickers"标签；
2、在“Search Stickers"处切换中文输入法，随便输入几个中文字；
3、回到主界面，编辑文本试试？恭喜您！
（以上操作只需一次即可解决）
summary: 关于中文输入的解决办法

description: 怎么调出中文界面或者汉化啊？英文界面看的费劲
需要去学习吧,不好看懂
界面清新，简单易用，可导出很多格式。

RT。
自己本地化了一下界面，使用比较方便。
但按ctrl+space出来不中文输入法，是什么原因呢？
复制进去的中文是没有问题的。
summary: 不能调出中文输入法，是快捷键冲突吗？
